wikipedia_page.main: Richard Wright Procter (1816–1881) was an English barber, poet and author.

response: * Richard Wright Procter (1816–1881), English barber, poet and author
*Richard Wright Procter. Memorials of Manchester Streets pp. 151–162 (Manchester, T. Sutcliffe, 1874).

Richard Wright Procter enumerates Aston's "newspapers, books, and plays" but omits "his pamphlets and reprints on local history" as being too numerous in chapter XIII, Literary Deansgate of his Memorials of Manchester Streets.Richard Wright Procter (1874) Memorials of Manchester Streets. Manchester: T. Sutcliffe; pp. 167-72
